mapper.sql: id, type, xh, xm, xb, zylb, sfzh, xl, xz, rxnf, nj, xsm, zym, bjh, xjdm, xxdm, zxjxjhh
mapper.delete:
delete from LANGUAGE_EXAM where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam where id = #{id}

select from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam
${whereSql}
select from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam

select from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam
${p.whereSql}
select count(1) from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam

select count(1) from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam
${whereSql}
select count(1) from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam

select row_number() over(order by id) as num,
from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam where languageExam.zxjxjhh = #{zxjxjhh}

select distinct 'CET4' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and dqnj = #{firstGrade} and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.XSLBDM in (${benkeType})
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join CET_STUSCORE ON CET_STUSCORE.Ks_Xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and dqnj = #{firstGrade} and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF >= #{cet4PassScore} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CET4' )
and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where (CET_STUSCORE.ks_qk = '缺考' or CET_STUSCORE.ks_wj = '违纪') and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CET4' and CET_STUSCORE.ks_kssj = #{cet4LastExamTerm} )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${russianKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${japaneseKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) )
and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm not in (${specialXsm})
and xh not in (select distinct xh from CET_STU_YYFBCJ where djcj < #{classaEnglish})
and xh not in (select distinct xh from CET_STU_YYFBCJ where djcj < #{classbEnglish})
and xh not in (select distinct xh from CET_STU_YYFBCJ where djcj < #{classcEnglish})
and xh not in ( select xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh from xs_xjxxb_view_kw left join cj_all_kw_view ON cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh where cj_all_kw_view.kch = #{englisthKch} and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.sfyxj = '是' and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.dqnj = #{firstGrade} and cj_all_kw_view.zxjxjhh = #{englisthZxjxjhh} and cj_all_kw_view.kxh in (${classaKxh}) and cj_all_kw_view.kccj $lt; #{classaEnglish} )
and xh not in ( select xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh from xs_xjxxb_view_kw left join cj_all_kw_view ON cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh where cj_all_kw_view.kch = #{englisthKch} and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.sfyxj = '是' and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.dqnj = #{firstGrade} and cj_all_kw_view.zxjxjhh = #{englisthZxjxjhh} and cj_all_kw_view.kxh in (${classbKxh}) and cj_all_kw_view.kccj $lt; #{classbEnglish} )
and xh not in ( select xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh from xs_xjxxb_view_kw left join cj_all_kw_view ON cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh where cj_all_kw_view.kch = #{englisthKch} and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.sfyxj = '是' and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.dqnj = #{firstGrade} and cj_all_kw_view.zxjxjhh = #{englisthZxjxjhh} and cj_all_kw_view.kxh in (${classcKxh}) and cj_all_kw_view.kccj $lt; #{classcEnglish} )

select distinct 'CET4' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and dqnj = #{secondGrade} and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.XSLBDM in (${benkeType})
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join CET_STUSCORE ON CET_STUSCORE.Ks_Xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and dqnj = #{secondGrade} and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF >= #{cet4PassScore} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CET4' )
and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where (CET_STUSCORE.ks_qk = '缺考' or CET_STUSCORE.ks_wj = '违纪') and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CET4' and CET_STUSCORE.ks_kssj = #{cet4LastExamTerm} )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${russianKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${japaneseKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) )
and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm not in (${specialXsm})
and xh not in ( select xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh from xs_xjxxb_view_kw left join cj_all_kw_view ON cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh where cj_all_kw_view.kch = #{englisthSecondKch} and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.sfyxj = '是' and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.dqnj = #{secondGrade} and cj_all_kw_view.zxjxjhh = #{englisthSecondZxjxjhh} and cj_all_kw_view.kxh in (${classaSecondKxh}) and cj_all_kw_view.kccj $lt; #{classaSecondEnglish} )
and xh not in ( select xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh from xs_xjxxb_view_kw left join cj_all_kw_view ON cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh where cj_all_kw_view.kch = #{englisthSecondKch} and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.sfyxj = '是' and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.dqnj = #{secondGrade} and cj_all_kw_view.zxjxjhh = #{englisthSecondZxjxjhh} and cj_all_kw_view.kxh in (${classbSecondKxh}) and cj_all_kw_view.kccj $lt; #{classbSecondEnglish} )
and xh not in ( select xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh from xs_xjxxb_view_kw left join cj_all_kw_view ON cj_all_kw_view.xh = xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh where cj_all_kw_view.kch = #{englisthSecondKch} and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.sfyxj = '是' and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.dqnj = #{secondGrade} and cj_all_kw_view.zxjxjhh = #{englisthSecondZxjxjhh} and cj_all_kw_view.kxh in (${classcSecondKxh}) and cj_all_kw_view.kccj $lt; #{classcSecondEnglish} )

select distinct 'CET4' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and dqnj = #{thirdGrade} and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.XSLBDM in (${benkeType})

select distinct 'CET4' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and dqnj = #{firstGrade} and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.XSLBDM in (${juniorType}) and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'PRETCO-B' and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF < #{pretcoPassScore} )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join CET_STUSCORE ON CET_STUSCORE.Ks_Xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and XSLBDM in (${juniorType}) and dqnj = #{firstGrade} and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF >= #{cet4PassScore} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CET4' )
and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where (CET_STUSCORE.ks_qk = '缺考' or CET_STUSCORE.ks_wj = '违纪') and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CET4' and CET_STUSCORE.ks_kssj = #{cet4LastExamTerm} )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${russianKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${japaneseKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) )
and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm not in (${specialXsm})

and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) )

select distinct 'CRT4' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and xh in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${russianKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join CET_STUSCORE ON CET_STUSCORE.Ks_Xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF >= #{crt4PassScore} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CRT4' )
and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where (CET_STUSCORE.ks_qk = '缺考' or CET_STUSCORE.ks_wj = '违纪') and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CRT4' and CET_STUSCORE.ks_kssj = #{crt4LastExamTerm} )
and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm not in (${specialXsm})

and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join CET_STUSCORE ON CET_STUSCORE.Ks_Xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF >= #{cjt4PassScore} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CJT4' )

select distinct 'CGT4' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and xh in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) )

and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm not in (${specialXsm})

select distinct 'CGT6' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bjh, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and xh in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) ) and xh in ( select distinct xh from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join CET_STUSCORE ON CET_STUSCORE.Ks_Xh = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and CET_STUSCORE.KS_ZF >= #{cgt4PassScore} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'CGT4' )
and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm not in (${specialXsm})

select distinct 'PORECT-B' as type, '15010' as xxdm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xm, case XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xb WHEN '男' then '1' WHEN '女' then '2' ELSE '0' end as xb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xh, '1' as zjlb, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfzh, '20' as xl, XSZYXXB.XZ as xz, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.rxnj,3,2) as rxnf, substr(XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.dqnj,3,2) as nj, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xsm, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym, XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.bm, '15010' as xjdm from XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW left join XSZYXXB ON XSZYXXB.zym = XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.zym where XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.sfyxj = '是' and XS_XJXXB_VIEW_KW.xslbdm in (#{juniorType})
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${russianKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${japaneseKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct xh from XK_XKB_VIEW where kch in (${germanKch}) )
and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'PORECT-B' and CET_STUSCORE.ks_kssj = #{pretcoLastExamTerm} and CET_STUSCORE.ks_zf >= #{pretcoPassScore} )
and xh not in ( select distinct ks_xh from CET_STUSCORE where (CET_STUSCORE.ks_qk = '缺考' or CET_STUSCORE.ks_wj = '违纪') and CET_STUSCORE.ks_yyjb = 'PORECT-B' and CET_STUSCORE.ks_kssj = #{pretcoLastExamTerm} )
select from LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam where type = #{exportType}

zylb,

insert into LANGUAGE_EXAM (id,type,xh,xm,xb,zylb,sfzh,xl,xz,rxnf,nj,xsm,zym,bjh,xjdm,xxdm,zxjxjhh)
select #{lang.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.zylb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.rxnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.nj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.zym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.xxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang.zxjxjhh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xh = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xm = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xb = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zylb = #{zylb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sfzh = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xl = #{xl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xz = #{xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rxnf = #{rxnf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nj = #{nj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xsm = #{xsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zym = #{zym,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjh = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xjdm = #{xjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xxdm = #{xxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zxjxjhh = #{zxjxjhh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id= #{id}
update LANGUAGE_EXAM languageExam set deleted=1 where id=#{id}
